pageTitle: Itinerary for Tuesday, September 6, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Tuesday, September 6, 2016:

Hong Kong, People’s Republic of China

12:30 a.m. The Prime Minister and Ms. Grégoire Trudeau will arrive in Hong Kong, People’s Republic of China

Hong Kong International Airport

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity only

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister and Ms. Grégoire Trudeau will visit the Sai Wan War Cemetery

Sai Wan War Cemetery
Hong Kong, China

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity only

10:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with Mr. Li Ka-shing, Chairman of CK Hutchinson Holdings Limited and Mr. Li Victor, Deputy Chairman and Group Co-Managing Director

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity only

12:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will speak to the Canadian Chamber of Commerce in Hong Kong            

Island Shangri-La Hotel
Pacific Place, Supreme
Court Road, Central
Hong Kong, China

Note for media:

  • Remarks open media coverage

3:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with Hong Kong’s Chief Executive CY Leung

Government House
Upper Albert Road
Mid-Levels
Hong Kong, China

Note for media:

  •  Pooled photo opportunity only

PMO Media Relations:
media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
